description:
This course is for business owners, managers, finance professionals or business students who want to learn to build financial models.

If you have basic Excel skills and a basic understanding of financial concepts, you will be able to follow the course.

I teach step-by-step, from simple steps like creating our input sheet to advanced calculations like cost of capital and share buy backs.

Only essential skills are taught; I don't waste time on skills you don't need.

The course is great value for money and it's far easier to learn to build financial models with my video course than trying to learn from a book.
title: Financial Model Fundamentals-Learn the Essential Skills
